law.catch_line: At any time before final action on an application, a party of record may file with the County Manage...
law.text:
At any time before final action on an application, a party of record may file with the County Manager an affidavit including competent evidence of:
a contribution by an applicant covered under § 15-854 of this part; or
an ex parte communication covered under § 15-855 of this part.
